snippet.title: Nova Hearts - Official Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the Nova Hearts trailer for the turn-based combat dating adventure. Follow Luce and her crew as they search for answers to the mysterious cosmic force that has turned them, and others, into powerful superheroes and villains. Explore a variety of romantic connections with the cast of hot singles in your area, fight beasts from an alternate dimension, and more.

Nova Hearts is coming to PlayStation and Xbox consoles, Nintendo Switch, and PC in Autumn/Fall 2024. You can wishlist it now on Steam.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
